body_html:
I fixed the atomicAdd ovelroad. PTAL.
However, I did consider it before, and I felt overloading might be slightly better because that forces a compilation error when one compiles against a new CUDA version. This means the code will be forced to be fixed, instead of using an inefficient version. That said, a custom wrapper isn't that bad so I did it anyway.

body:
I fixed the `atomicAdd` ovelroad.  PTAL.
However, I did consider it before, and I felt overloading might be slightly better because that forces a compilation error when one compiles against a new CUDA version.  This means the code will be forced to be fixed, instead of using an inefficient version.  That said, a custom wrapper isn't that bad so I did it anyway.
